title: 83/56/EEC: Commission Decision of 26 January 1983 approving an amendment to the outline programme under Council Regulation (EEC) No 269/79 for certain Mediterranean areas of France (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 26 January 1983
approving an amendement to the outline programme under Council Regulation (EEC) No 269/79 for certain Mediterranean areas of France
(Only the French text is authentic)
(83/56/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The amendment to the outline programme for Mediterranean areas of France, submitted by the French Government on 30 September 1982 pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 269/79, is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 January 1983.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 38, 14. 2. 1979, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 322, 18. 12. 1979, p. 29.
